extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100% !important; position: fixed; top:0;}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width: 5000px} body { margin: 52px auto 0; } #contents06 h3 { letter-spacing: normal; } #pc_head h1 { width: auto; } #pc_head ul { width: auto; } #mainvisual div.headmenu { top: 0;} footer .info .right table td.day{ width: auto; } *{ letter-spacing: normal !important; } #bc { top: 93px; z-index: 9999; } .fixed { top:52px; } #pc_nav { top: 93px; } #pc_head ul li span:lang(en) {display: inline-block;width: 250px;line-height: normal;vertical-align: middle;} @media only screen and (max-width: 1600px) { #pc_head h1 span:lang(en) { display: inline-block;width: 500px; padding: 1% 1% 0; }} @media only screen and (max-width: 768px) { #contents06 .right a { font-size: 85%; }}
